segments.text: It looks very nice and the food looks delicious .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , there might be some food you have never eaten before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yes . Like this , for example . Have you ever eaten jellyfish before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I haven ’ t . I have never eaten jellyfish before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about these ? Have you ever tried pig ’ s brains ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I have not and I ’ m not sure I want to try them now .
segments.speaker: S2
